content.prompt: To ensure viewers would recognize this Ndop (portrait figure) as King Mishe miShyaang maMbul, the subject of the work chose to be represented with

choices.label: a ceremonial knife (ikul), held in the figure’s left hand
an identifying inscription, written on the sculpture’s base
a unique scarification pattern, visible on the figure’s arms
a carved drum, positioned in front of the seated figure

skill.text: Skill 1.C: Explain how artistic decisions about form, style, materials, technique, and/or content shape a work of art (or group of related works of art).
